languages.text: {n}Прочистив горло, Ульфар добавляет уже обычным голосом:{/n} "Надеюсь, с пиром ты затягивать не будешь. Отметить наше спасение надо с размахом и весельем!"
{n}After clearing his throat, Ulfar adds in a more ordinary voice,{/n} "I hope you're not going to put off the feast. Our escape demands a grand celebration!"
languages.original_text: {n}Прочистив горло, Ульфар добавляет уже обычным голосом:{/n} "Надеюсь, с пиром ты затягивать не будешь. Отметить наше спасение надо с размахом и весельем!"

traits.locale_text: {n}After clearing his throat, Ulfar adds in a more ordinary voice,{/n} "I hope you're not going to put off the feast. Our escape demands a grand and joyous celebration!"
{n}After clearing his throat, Ulfar adds in a more ordinary voice,{/n} "I hope you're not going to put off the feast. Our escape demands a grand and joyous celebration!"
{n}After clearing his throat, Ulfar adds in a more ordinary voice,{/n} "I hope you're not going to put off the feast. Our escape demands a grand and joyous celebration!"
{n}After clearing his throat, Ulfar adds in a more ordinary voice,{/n} "I hope you're not going to put off the feast. Our escape demands a grand celebration!"

languages.text: {n}乌尔法清了清嗓子，以更加平常的声音补充道。{/n}“希望你不要推迟这场 盛宴。我们成功地逃了出来，需要盛大地庆祝一番！”
languages.original_text: {n}After clearing his throat, Ulfar adds in a more ordinary voice,{/n} "I hope you're not going to put off the feast. Our escape demands a grand celebration!"

traits.locale_text: {n}乌尔法清了清嗓子，以更加平常的声音补充道。{/n}“希望你不要推迟这场 盛宴。我们成功地逃了出来，需要盛大而隆重地庆祝一番！”

languages.text: {n}Tras carraspear, Ulfar añade en tono más normal:{/n} «Espero que no posponga la fiesta. ¡Nuestra huida exige una grandiosa celebración!».
languages.original_text: {n}After clearing his throat, Ulfar adds in a more ordinary voice,{/n} "I hope you're not going to put off the feast. Our escape demands a grand celebration!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Tras carraspear, Ulfar añade en tono más normal:{/n} «Espero que no posponga la fiesta. ¡Nuestra huida exige una grandiosa y alegre celebración!».

languages.text: {n}咳払いをした後、ウルファーは普通の声でこう付け加えた。{/n}「お前が宴を先延ばしにしないでくれることを願いたいもんだな。俺達の脱出には、盛大な祝宴が必要だ！」
languages.original_text: {n}After clearing his throat, Ulfar adds in a more ordinary voice,{/n} "I hope you're not going to put off the feast. Our escape demands a grand celebration!"

traits.locale_text: {n}咳払いをした後、ウルファーは普通の声でこう付け加えた。{/n}「お前が宴を先延ばしにしないでくれることを願いたいもんだな。俺達の脱出には、盛大で楽しい祝宴が必要だ！」

languages.text: {n}Nachdem er sich geräuspert hat, ergänzt Ulfar in einer etwas normaleren Stimme:{/n} "Ich hoffe, Ihr werdet das Fest nicht verschieben. Unsere Flucht verlangt nach einer großen Freudenfeier!"
languages.original_text: {n}After clearing his throat, Ulfar adds in a more ordinary voice,{/n} "I hope you're not going to put off the feast. Our escape demands a grand celebration!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Nachdem er sich geräuspert hat, ergänzt Ulfar in einer etwas normaleren Stimme:{/n} "Ich hoffe, Ihr werdet das Fest nicht verschieben. Unsere Flucht verlangt nach einer großen Freudenfeier!"

languages.text: {n}Après s'être raclé la gorge, Ulfar ajoute sur un ton plus posé :{/n} « J'espère que vous n'allez pas annuler le banquet. Notre évasion appelle de grandioses festivités ! »
languages.original_text: {n}After clearing his throat, Ulfar adds in a more ordinary voice,{/n} "I hope you're not going to put off the feast. Our escape demands a grand celebration!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Après s'être raclé la gorge, Ulfar ajoute sur un ton plus posé :{/n} « J'espère que vous n'allez pas annuler le banquet. Notre évasion exige des festivités grandioses ! »

languages.original_text: {n}After clearing his throat, Ulfar adds in a more ordinary voice,{/n} "I hope you're not going to put off the feast. Our escape demands a grand celebration!"

languages.text: {n}Ulfar, boğazını temizledikten sonra normal bir ses tonuyla ekliyor.{/n} "Umarım ziyafetimize icabet edebilirsin. Bu kaçışı kutlamak gerek!"
languages.original_text: {n}After clearing his throat, Ulfar adds in a more ordinary voice,{/n} "I hope you're not going to put off the feast. Our escape demands a grand celebration!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Ulfar boğazını temizledikten sonra normal bir ses tonuyla ekliyor:{/n} "Umarım ziyafetimize icabet edebilirsin. Bu kaçışı kutlamak gerek!"
